primary_problem: Manual order fulfillment requires 3 people touching every order across ShipStation, Shopify, and their 3PL portal, taking 15 minutes per order across 80-100 daily orders, creating bottlenecks and an 8% error rate.
desired_outcome: Fully automated order routing from Shopify to the correct 3PL based on product type and shipping zone, with tracking sync, customer notifications, and exception flagging  -  enabling same-day fulfillment and scaling to 500+ orders/day without additional staff.
trigger_description: A new order is placed in Shopify, firing a webhook to kick off the automation.
process_description: The automation evaluates the order's product type and shipping zone, routes it to the correct 3PL via API, syncs the tracking number back to Shopify, triggers a shipping notification in Klaviyo, and flags any exceptions for manual review with error handling and retry logic.
output_description: Orders are automatically routed to the correct 3PL, tracking numbers are synced to Shopify, and exception reports are generated for manual review.
notification_description: Customers are notified of shipping updates via Klaviyo, and the team is alerted to flagged exceptions requiring manual review.

scope_items.label: Smart routing logic (product type + shipping zone)
Tracking number sync back to Shopify

out_of_scope: 3PL account setup and Shopify theme changes are not included in this engagement.

phases.name: Integration Setup
phases.deliverable: Shopify + 3PL API connections established and authenticated

phases.name: Routing Logic
phases.deliverable: Smart routing engine with exception handling built and configured

phases.name: Testing & Launch
phases.deliverable: End-to-end testing completed and system goes live

roi_details: Saves 20-25 hours/week in manual processing, eliminates the current ~8% order routing error rate, enables same-day fulfillment instead of 24-hour delays, and allows scaling to 500+ orders/day without hiring additional staff.
access_requirements: Shopify admin API credentials and webhook configuration access
API credentials and documentation for both 3PL providers
Klaviyo API key and account access
Product type and shipping zone routing rules documentation
Exception criteria definitions for manual review flagging
upsell_opportunities: Future automations could include inventory sync across 3PLs with low-stock alerts, automated returns/exchange processing, and a real-time fulfillment analytics dashboard.
_feedback: Change the quoted price to 4200 and add a 4th phase: Optimization (2 days) - Performance tuning and monitoring setup
